msg.msgText: Failed to create handler {0} for failed message deliveries because the MessageEndpointFactory type {1} is not supported. The Message Gateway resource adapter will function correctly. However, the maxDeliveryFailures activation specification property will not be used to pause the message endpoint.

msgExplanation.p: The Message Gateway handler for pausing the endpoint after a specified number of failures is supported only for IBM WebSphere Application Server.

msgUserResponse.p: Contact IBM Support if this error is reported and you wish to use the maxDeliveryFailures activation specification property.
